document_data.caption: The Sword Mountains on a [[1357 DR]] map.
document_data.name: Sword Mountains (Mulhorand)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sword Mountains''', located in central [[Mulhorand]], served as a barrier between the [[Plains of Purple Dust]] and the rest of the nation.
document_data.Geography: The Sword Mountains were considered impassable by the people of Mulhorand, and as a result remained largely unexplored. They protected the populated regions of the nation from the storms of the Plains of Purple Dust.

Inhabitants.Notable Individuals: * [[Gestaniius]]: This [[blue dragon]] was well known for her raids throughout the [[Land of the Dead]], located just west of the Sword Mountains.

document_data.Places of Interest: * [[Tomb of Horuseres II]]: This tomb, carved from the stone of the Swords itself, was the resting place of [[Horuseres II]]. It was heavily protected and had never been looted.
